title: Strengthening e-Learning Practical Competencies: Knowledge Management Strategies for Innovative Performance Creation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and team project experience
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish between the concepts of exploration and exploitation and explain their impact on innovation outcomes.
Learners can establish optimal effort distribution strategies based on team collaboration experiences.
Learners can evaluate knowledge management strategies through innovative solutions and failure case analyses in project-based assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
